manage_feeds_button.tooltip: Launch the feeds manager application to add/remove/edit feeds.

pref_overlay_key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu.

pref_new_feed_icon.description: Icon used when there are new feeds
pref_new_feed_icon.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

pref_feed_icon.description: Icon used when there are not new feeds
pref_feed_icon.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

pref_max_items.tooltip: Maximum number of items to display for each feed.

pref_refresh_interval_mins.tooltip: Interval between checking for new items.

pref_notifications_enabled.tooltip: If enabled, a popup notification will be displayed for new items.

pref_unified_notifications.tooltip: If enabled, all feeds notifications will use and update one notification.

pref_third_party_integration_panel_drawe.tooltip: Display applet when receiving new items.

pref_logging_level.tooltip:
It enables the ability to log the output of several functions used by the extension.

Normal: Only log messages caused by non critical errors.
Verbose: Additionally log extra output messages and all HTTP responses.
Very verbose: Additionally log all method calls from all JavaScript classes/prototypes along with their execution time.

pref_debugger_enabled.tooltip: It enables the ability to catch all exceptions that under normal use would not be caught.

pref_last_checked_storage.description: Storage for last feeds checked values.
